sect3.title: Configuration Information

screen.userinput: echo "smtp stream tcp nowait qmaild/var/qmail/bin/tcp-env \ tcp-env /var/qmail/bin/qmail-smtpd" >> /etc/inetd.conf

sect3.para: Add: sh -cf '/var/qmail/rc &' to your boot scripts, so that the qmail daemons are restarted whenever your system reboots. Make sure you include the &.
